topBannerDesc: No.1 Airdrop Launchpool for Open Campus Projects
fuelingPeriodDesc: Fueling Period is when the project is officially open for airdrop subscription on our platform. Anyone who has gone through the login process can join the fueling pool. How many airdrop token you get from project depends on your fuel. For detailed fuel calculation rules, check out this doc:
allocationPeriodDesc: Once the fueling period is over, the smart contract will be calculating each user‚Äôs token allocation for a given amount of time. Then you will have a clear timetable for the number of tokens you get and when can you get them.
airdropPeriodDesc: Finally, after the project's tge(token generation event), you will get your token allocation. Usually these tokens will be directly airdroped to your wallet address you connected on this platform.
chooseBestProjectSection1Title: Work with Partners that have Established Reputation and Branding in Running Hackathon and Accelerator
chooseBestProjectSection1Desc: We will be working with partners like HackQuest that has built an established brand of hackathon and accelerator. Therefore, only the best projects can get through our selection.
chooseBestProjectSection2Desc: HackQuest already have one of the largest founder's community in APAC region. Working closely with HackQuest, we can tap into their valuable founders‚Äô resources.
chooseBestProjectSection3Desc: We are deeply involved in founders' network in APAC, US, and India.
projectsSupportDesc: Many talented founders capable of delivering high-quality products often lack the experience needed to build a crypto community. We address this critical need by offering our support, and allowing them solely focusing on delivering good products.

connectWalletWarn: WarningÔºöAs we require you stake $Edu Token in order to get airdrop share, please use wallet that has $Edu asset so you don't have to transfer assets later.
inputInviteCodeDesc: An invite code is required to participate a project. Both the invitee and the inviter can get 500 fuel reward if the invite code is applied here.
noInviteCodeDesc: Don‚Äôt have an invite code? Ask for one on Twitter.

fuelingDescriptionTop: Fueling Period is when the project is officially open for airdrop subscription on our platform. Anyone who has gone through the login process can join the fueling pool. How many airdrop token you get from project depends on your fuel. There are many ways you can add fuels:
fuelingDescription2: Stake $Edu token. The more & longer you stake, the more allocation you get.
fuelingDescription3: Invite your friends to join the pool
fuelingDescriptionBottom: For detailed fuel calculation rules, check out this doc:
allocationDescription: Once the fueling period is over, the smart contract will be calculating each user‚Äôs token allocation for a given amount of time. Then you will have a clear timetable for the number of tokens you get and when can you get them.
airdropDescription: Finally, after the project's tge(token generation event), you will get your token allocation. Usually these tokens will be directly airdroped to your wallet address you connected on this platform.
fuelCongratulations: Congratulations! It‚Äôs time to claim your token!
stakeDescription: In order to access all fuel approaches and the eligibility of Allocation & Airdrop, you need to stake Manta tokens
shareYourInviteCodetoEarnFuel: Share Your Invite Code to Earn Fuel
shareDescription: Every time when invitee uses invite code to participate in this project, both the inviter and the invitee can receive 500 fuel. Moreover, the inviter will receive 1% of the total fuel from all invitees.
stakeDurationDescription: *The Fuel you receive will be proportional to the size and length (in time) of your stake. To learn more about the calculation rule, click here.
dontOut: DO NOT refresh or leave before the transaction is completed.
unStakeWarning: If you choose to unstake now, your fuel under this stake will be removed. If there is no stake from you in this project, your fuel will be zeroed and you will be ineligible to participate in this project IAO anymore.
